channel.title: [317 - DELTA] How to exit an interface? [Rep ++]
channel.description:
-317 DELTA- Well I've started adding custom interfaces and when a player clicks on a quest, the interface shows like it is supposed to. There is several clickable-buttons within sed interface and one is, "Click here to Play." I want that button to just close the interface. That's all. The main interface:
case 28165: c.showInterface(7082); break;
Click Here to Play button:
case 27182: ????????????????? break;
I would try adding c.clearQuestInterface(); in where the "??????????" are located, but that won't work for this. I'm not sure of the "exit interface" command so if anyone can help me, i'll rep++!

item.title: [317 - DELTA] How to exit an interface? [Rep ++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

That worked, thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - DELTA] How to exit an interface? [Rep ++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

-317 DELTA-
Well I’ve started adding custom interfaces and when a player clicks on a quest, the interface shows like it is supposed to.
There is several clickable-buttons within sed interface and one is, “Click here to Play.”
I want that button to just close the interface. That’s all.

The main interface:

case 28165: c.showInterface(7082); break;

Click Here to Play button:

case 27182: ????????????????? break;

I would try adding c.clearQuestInterface(); in where the “???” are located, but that won’t work for this.

I’m not sure of the “exit interface” command so if anyone can help me, i’ll rep++!

Read full topic
